name: Kryce
description:
Kryce is bullethell game controlled directly with the analog stick.
The position of your analog stick is mapped one-to-one to the position of the player in the game.

Move inside the circle, dodge the shots, survive!

Created for the Simple Jam
Made using Luxe
Sound effects done in SunVox
Font used: Kelson Sans
Source Code can be found on Github

NOTE: A controller is required to play this game!
